attributes.action: Teach British Sign Language in all stages of education.
attributes.additional_details: 11 million people in the UK are deaf or hard of hearing. There are 151,000 BSL users in the UK. There are myriad of various difficulties they're facing - and most of them could be easily minimised. Teaching BSL not only will allow non-deaf people to communicate and interact with deaf people, but most importantly; it'll raise the awareness of the struggles deaf people facing - ultimately creating mindset for improvement.
attributes.background: Teach British Sign Language alongside/instead of foreign language in all stages of Education.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599565
